data.title: Portrait of the architect Alexandre Bénard, full-length, with fragments of classical capitals, the Roman Forum beyond
data.meta_description: Full-length portrait, with fragments of classical capitals, the Roman Forum beyond
data.text:
CultureFrench

Titles

Portrait of the architect Alexandre Bénard, full-length, with fragments of classical capitals, the Roman Forum beyond

Place depictedRome, Italy

MediumGraphite heightened with bodycolor on cream wove paper

DimensionsSheet: 18 1/4 × 14 in. (46.4 × 35.6 cm)

Mat: 20 1/4 × 15 3/4 in. (51.4 × 40 cm)

Credit LineMuseum purchase funded by the Brown Foundation Accessions Endowment Fund

Object number2014.144

Not on view

Explore Further

Object Type

DRAWINGS, PASTELS & WATERCOLORS

ProvenanceThe sitter, Alexandre Bénard; by descent to his wife Madame A. Bénard, née Marie Louise Bidot, later Baronne Emil von Pappenheim; A. Marcel; [Hôtel Drouot, Paris, February 8, 1886, lot 1]; Arthur Georges Veil-Picard; by descent to the Veil-Picard family; [Christie’s, Paris, “The Veil-Picard Collection,” June 23, 2010, lot 79]; [Christie's, London, “Old Master and British Drawings and Watercolours,” July 10, 2014, lot 175]; purchased by MFAH, 2014.

Exhibition History"Dessins [d'Ingres] tirés de collections d'amateurs," Salon des Arts Unis, Paris, 1861.

"Instants choisis des XIXème et XXème siècles," Galerie Schmit, Paris, February 14–April 12, 2002.

Inscriptions, Signatures and Marks

Recto: Signed in graphite, bottom left: Ingres Li[...]

Recto: Inscribed and dated in graphite, bottom right: Rome 1818

Interior of mat board: Inscribed in graphite, center: Ingres

Recto: Signed in graphite, bottom left: Ingres Li[...]

Catalogue raisonnéVigne 2816

Cataloguing data may change with further research.

If you have questions about this work of art or the MFAH Online Collection please contact us.
